name: Konyamo Dorubako!!
overview: Konya mo Dorubako!! is the first game based on the popular (in Japan) TV Show. The game features 2 game modes, in the battle mode the player have to go around the town and play the 3 different pachinko machines againts the 3 different computer characters and try to win prizes, in the simulation mode the player can choose one of the machines and then the player can edit the different machine features, etc.
